examples.description: can find a song when given a full song name
examples.full_description: CLI Jukebox methods #play can find a song when given a full song name

examples.description: returns an error when given a number that does not correspond to a song
examples.full_description: CLI Jukebox methods #play returns an error when given a number that does not correspond to a song

examples.description: returns an error when given a name that does not correspond to an existing song
examples.full_description: CLI Jukebox methods #play returns an error when given a name that does not correspond to an existing song
CLI Jukebox methods #list lists out the available songs

examples.description: terminates the running of the program and outputs 'Goodbye'
